IMHO, it's not a bad attempt at sahari type work. It's a definite
"lump" zogan. I've a similar tsuba on my Saotome-Tembo page
with brass zogan done in a similar molten lumpy style (lower
left on page).

http://www.geocities.com/alchemyst/tsuba/saotome.htm

While it doesn't show in the photo, due to size of pic, the tsuba has
the typical hot stamped kokuin of the Tembo type tsuba.

Rich S
